post.text: We are one nation. When one state hurts, we all hurt. We must all work together - to lift each other up. -DJT

comment.author: Michael
comment.text: The words of a wise,true caring man,that is runnin for office not cause he has to he doesnt have to work a day the rest of his life,has nothing to gain if elected,yet been ran thru the mud i the media,a man who just wants whats best for his country, a true leader man of great honor,im with you Mr Trump..im struggling welder mechanic from east tx,i support you 100%.

replies.author: Kathryn
replies.text: Trump will be in Louisiana today while... Obama plays golf in Hawaii & Hillary takes a nap Who do you want as president?

replies.author: Seth
replies.text: Michael, hope things get better for you!
